definition: to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
to step on/to tread/to stamp/to press a pedal/to pedal (a bike)/(online) to downvote
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: While treading water, one does not push down on the water.
sentences.chinese: 當你做踩水動作時，你不會從水面之上向水下壓水。

sentences.english: If you can't get back to the beach, tread water and wave for a lifeguard's help.
sentences.chinese: 假如你無法游回岸邊，可踩水並向救生員揮手求救。

sentences.english: Enjoying the view of barefooted girls.
I tread water for three days in a row.
sentences.chinese: 有時，我可以連續三天踩水。

sentences.english: Get in the water and swim (or tread water) for 2-3 minutes to get your body warmed up.
sentences.chinese: 下到水裏游泳或踩水2至3分鐘來喚醒你的身體。

sentences.english: The crew of the capsized yacht had to tread water until the rescuers arrived.
sentences.chinese: 傾覆了，人們在營救人員到達以前只得踩水。

sentences.english: This same lift force is generated while treading water.
sentences.chinese: 當運動員進行踩水的時候也會有相同的上升力產生。

sentences.english: They may just look like they are treading water and looking up at the deck.
sentences.chinese: 他們看起來可能就像是在踩水和看着甲板。

sentences.english: And flippaball is in the water, so you need to tread water the whole time.
sentences.chinese: 而且水球是在水裏，你一直都要踩水。

definition: Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
